product_name: REI Mesh X X Large Stuff Sack - 10 x 26
long_description: Use this convenient mesh stuff sack to keep organized or to air-dry items. Durable polyester mesh construction with double-stitched and taped seams offers lasting service. Drawcord with cordlock securely closes sack opening; 1.5-inch nylon webbing handle for carrying or hanging. Color-coded mesh provides easy size identification. Available in sizes Medium through X X Large.
short_description: Use this convenient mesh stuff sack to keep organized or to air-dry items.
